did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Teachers Union of the City of New York Executive Board Minutes on Microfilm, 1929-1963

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Teachers Union of the City of New York

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection is the guide for meeting minutes of the Executive Board of the Teachers Union of the City of New York, 1929-1941, 1944-1963.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection is the guide for meeting minutes of the Executive Board of the Teachers Union of the City of New York, 1929-1941, 1944-1963.
A negative copy is available upon request. A negative copy of the Records Guide is also available upon request.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Teachers' Union of the City of New York

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Teachers' unions-- New York State-- New York.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Teachers Union of the City of New York Executive Board Minutes on Microfilm #5015 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
